pkgmetadata.longdescription: # sm3utilsSM3 Cryptographic Hash Algorithm.## Install```pip install sm3utils```## Usage```from sm3utils import sm3gen = sm3()gen.update(b'abc')result = gen.hexdigest()print("result=", result)# result= 66c7f0f462eeedd9d1f2d46bdc10e4e24167c4875cf2f7a2297da02b8f4ba8e0```## Releases### 0.1.2- First release.### 0.1.3- Add block_size and digest_size properties to sm3utils.sm3.
